statements: SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, progress_percentage FROM production_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE end_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT product_name, progress_percentage FROM production_schedule WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, progress_percentage FROM production_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, progress_percentage FROM production_schedule WHERE schedule_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules, AVG(progress_percentage) AS avg_progress FROM production_schedule WHERE progress_percentage < 100;
SELECT product_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule WHERE product_name LIKE '%product%' ORDER BY end_date ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT product_name, estimated_quantity FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT id, product_name, production_date FROM production_schedule ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, progress_status, completion_date FROM manufacturing_progress WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT product_id, completion_date FROM manufacturing_progress WHERE completion_date > '2023-01-15' ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE estimated_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_schedule WHERE product_name='Product A' OR product_name='Product B' ORDER BY production_date ASC
SELECT product_name, production_date, estimated_quantity, CASE WHEN estimated_quantity >= 200 THEN 'High' ELSE 'Low' END AS quantity_status FROM production_schedule

SELECT ps.product_name, mp.progress_status, mp.completion_date FROM production_schedule ps JOIN manufacturing_progress mp ON ps.id = mp.product_id WHERE mp.progress_status='Completed' ORDER BY mp.completion_date DESC
SELECT ps.product_name, COUNT(mp.id) AS progress_count FROM production_schedule ps LEFT JOIN manufacturing_progress mp ON ps.id = mp.product_id GROUP BY ps.product_name HAVING progress_count > 5
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingProcesses;
SELECT process_name, start_date, progress_percentage FROM ManufacturingProcesses WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT process_name, end_date, progress_percentage FROM ManufacturingProcesses ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time, assigned_worker FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE assigned_worker='John Doe';
SELECT worker_name, department FROM Workers WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingProcesses WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date FROM ManufacturingProcesses WHERE process_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time, assigned_worker FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE process_id = 2 ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT process_id, process_name, start_date, end_date, progress_percentage FROM ManufacturingProcesses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, department FROM Workers WHERE department = 'Production' ORDER BY worker_name;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedules;
SELECT product_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProductionSchedules WHERE production_line = 3;
SELECT id, description FROM ManufacturingProcesses WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT process_name, status FROM ManufacturingProcesses ORDER BY process_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProgressTracking WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedules WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, product_name, start_date FROM ProductionSchedules WHERE production_line = 3 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProductionSchedules WHERE production_line IN (1, 2) AND end_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT ps.product_name, mp.process_name, pt.progress_percentage FROM ProductionSchedules ps JOIN ManufacturingProcesses mp ON ps.id = mp.id JOIN ProgressTracking pt ON mp.id = pt.process_id;

SELECT ps.product_name, ps.start_date, ea.assignment_date, pt.progress_percentage, pt.last_updated FROM ProductionSchedules ps JOIN EmployeeAssignments ea ON ps.id = ea.process_id JOIN ProgressTracking pt ON ea.process_id = pt.process_id ORDER BY pt.progress_percentage DESC, ea.assignment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT product_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule WHERE status = 'InProgress';
SELECT equipment_name, location, maintenance_status FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT process_name, description FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM production_tasks WHERE deadline <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE responsible_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM production_tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT process_name, duration_hours FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE duration_hours > 5 AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule WHERE status = 'In Progress';
